homonyms.definition: thick, dense, entangled, or a thicket

definition: made greedy; become greedy; longing for
the name of one of the nine categories (aṅgas) of the scriptures
treating or decorating with red ocher

homonyms.definition: house; dwelling place; shelter; a home, a household; especially that of a layman, living in a worldly life in a family

definition: connected with, attached to, rooted in, the household (sensual) life
connected with, attached to, rooted in, the household (sensual) life; appropriate only for the household life
